latex:
Consider those functions $ f$ that satisfy $ f(x + 4) + f(x - 4) = f(x)$ for all real $ x$. Any such function is periodic, and there is a least common positive period $ p$ for all of them. Find $ p$.\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 8\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 12\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 16\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 24\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 32$
